heroSection.title: About Me
heroSection.subtitle: The story behind the lens and passion for capturing moments

myStory.heading: My Photography Journey
paragraphs: My love for photography began when I received my first camera at age 12. What started as capturing family moments evolved into a lifelong passion for storytelling through images.
After studying Visual Arts at NYU and assisting renowned photographers, I developed my signature style - a blend of authentic emotion and artistic composition that makes each photograph feel alive.

points.title: Authentic Connection
points.description: I focus on creating a comfortable environment where your true personality shines through.

points.title: Artistic Vision
points.description: Every shot is carefully composed with attention to light, angles, and emotion.

points.title: Timeless Quality
points.description: My editing style ensures your photos remain beautiful for generations.

cta.heading: Let's Create Something Beautiful Together
cta.text: I'd love to hear about your photography needs
